subject: Golf
Area Planning and Renewal
lead_paragraph: Twelve years after, Tom Cousins, an Atlanta commercial real estate mogul, unfurled his plans for rebuilding East Lake, the revitalized community is not merely thriving, its vision is spreading.
snippet: Twelve years after, Tom Cousins, an Atlanta commercial real estate mogul, unfurled his plans for rebuilding East Lake, the revitalized community is not merely thriving, its vision is spreading.
